page.title: 11ECOLOGY - FOOTPATHS
page.content: FOOTPATH 30/72 Hengoed to Bwlchwythaint starts Meinciau-Penylan road, across fields, passing Hencoed farm to meet Footpath 30/71 at Bwlchwythaint. FOOTPATH 30/73 Meinciau Mawr to Ffos Wilkin starts Meinciau-Penylan road, passes Meinciau Mawr farm, through rough grass and furze, fields, passing Ffos Wilkin, ends Four Roads-Fan Quarry road. FOOTPATH 30/74 Pontyates-Carmarthen road to Garnwen starts at junction of Pontyates-Carmarthen road and Meinciau-Ponthenry road, through fields to Garnwen farm. FOOTPATH 30/85 Hengoed to Tanybanc, Four Roads, starts Meinciau-Penylan road near Hengoed, along two lanes, through fields and woods - passes ouside our boundary.
